project.objective: The CARGOMIL is an innovative self propelled all terrain vehicle for mobilising “where and when the biomass is”. It is dedicated to mobilize large quantities of biomass such as wood, agro waste and herbaceous biomass (bio raw material).The final product delivered by the CARGOMILL is a tradable biomass format (briquette) with a better storability and longer shelf life delivering a higher economical and energetic value. The entire business model is based on a biomass supply service.
project.title: The CARGOMIL, an innovative self propelled all terrain vehicle for mobilising “where and when the biomass is”.
